task.title: Alive Day 16 Quest
task.body: Over the next few hours, tune into why you’re doing the activity you’re doing. Did you learn anything about yourself?

sharingWall.question: Did you learn anything about yourself?

followUp.title: Alive Day 16 Check-in
followUp.body: Time to check-in with today’s quest!

task.title: Uppdrag dag 16
task.body: De närmaste timmarna, fundera på **varför** du gör det du gör. Kan det lära dig något om dig själv?

sharingWall.question: Did you learn anything about yourself?
sharingWall.exampleText: Att jag gör mycket utan att tänka så mycket på det. På rutin.

followUp.title: Hur gick det?
followUp.body: Dags att checka in med dagens uppdrag!

task.title: Desafio ALIVE dia 16
task.body: Durante as próximas horas, tenta perceber porque estás a executar a atividade que estás a fazer. Aprendeste alguma coisa acerca de ti própia/o?

sharingWall.question: Aprendeste alguma coisa acerca de ti própria/o?

followUp.title: Check-in Dia 16 Alive
followUp.body: Está na altura de fazeres *check-in* no desafio de hoje!
